game.name: My Wife Threw Out My Card Collection (So I Bought a Dump to Find Them All) ⭐
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 아늑한 쓰레기 청소 시뮬레이터. 쓰레기장을 파고, 초희귀 컬렉션 카드를 찾고, 얽힌 새를 구하며 휴식을 취하세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A cozy garbage-cleaning simulator. Dig through the dump, find ultra-rare collectible cards, rescue tangled birds, and relax.

reviewHighlights.text: As of December 15 2025, this game is way too buggy to recommend. I still plan to 100% it because why not, it's all a collectathon. I went into the neg...
I would have never bought this game had I known the soundtrack was made with AI. The soundtrack ended up really being the only good part of the game,...
